Getting Started Examples

Several Jupyter notebooks and scripts are provided to quickly familiarize you with HistoART’s capabilities:

  • Dataset Preparation and Loading

    See the source: datasets.py

  • Artifact Feature Extraction

    See the source: analysis.py

  • Model Execution and Evaluation

    See the source: model_execution.py

  • Metrics Calculation

    Open the notebook: metrics.ipynb

  • Visualization Examples

    See the source: visualize.py

  • End-to-End Artifact Analysis

    Open the notebook: histoart.ipynb
